description: To support the ministry and access exclusive content, go to: ⁠⁠http://patreon.com/logicalbiblestudy⁠⁠ For complete verse-by-verse audio commentaries from Logical Bible Study, go to: ⁠⁠https://mysoundwise.com/publishers/1677296682850p  Luke 9: 1-6 - 'Take nothing for the journey.' html_description:
To support the ministry and access exclusive content, go to: ⁠⁠http://patreon.com/logicalbiblestudy⁠⁠


For complete verse-by-verse audio commentaries from Logical Bible Study, go to: ⁠⁠https://mysoundwise.com/publishers/1677296682850p




Luke 9: 1-6 - 'Take nothing for the journey.'




Catechism of the Catholic Church Paragraphs:


- 551 (in 'the Keys of the Kingdom') - From the beginning of his public life Jesus chose certain men, twelve in number, to be with him and to participate in his mission. He gives the Twelve a share in his authority and 'sent them out to preach the kingdom of God and to heal (abbreviated).




Got a Bible question? Send an email to logicalbiblestudy@gmail.com, and it will be answered in an upcoming episode!


---
Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/daily-gospel-exegesis/message
name: Wednesday of Week 25 in Ordinary Time - Luke 9: 1-6
